title: Douglass on Fourth of July - Effect

content.question: In the 1850s ideas such as those expressed in the excerpt most directly contributed to

choices.label: controversies over the expansion of slavery to new territories
the creation of separate African American churches
the extension of voting rights to African Americans in the North
growth in the international slave trade

content.answer: controversies over the expansion of slavery to new territories

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
